接口的使用
org.apache.catalina.Realm

  • 使用Realm的程序包 
    程序包 说明
    org.apache.catalina  
    org.apache.catalina.authenticator
    This package contains Authenticator implementations for the various supported authentication methods (BASIC, DIGEST, and FORM).
    org.apache.catalina.core  
    org.apache.catalina.ha.session  
    org.apache.catalina.realm
    This package contains Realm implementations for the various supported realm technologies for authenticating users and identifying their associated roles.
    org.apache.catalina.startup  

    • org.apache.catalina中Realm的使用

      返回Realm的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      Realm Container.getRealm()
      Return the Realm with which this Container is associated.
      参数类型为Realm的org.apache.catalina中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void Container.setRealm(Realm realm)
      Set the Realm with which this Container is associated.

    • org.apache.catalina.authenticator中Realm的使用

      参数类型为Realm的org.apache.catalina.authenticator中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      protected boolean SingleSignOn.reauthenticate(java.lang.String ssoId, Realm realm, Request request)
      Attempts reauthentication to the given Realm using the credentials associated with the single sign-on session identified by argument ssoId.

    • org.apache.catalina.realm中Realm的使用

      实现Realm的org.apache.catalina.realm中的类 
      限定符和类型 类和说明
      class  CombinedRealm
      Realm implementation that contains one or more realms.
      class  DataSourceRealm
      Implementation of Realm that works with any JDBC JNDI DataSource.
      class  JAASMemoryLoginModule
      Implementation of the JAAS LoginModule interface, primarily for use in testing JAASRealm.
      class  JAASRealm
      Implementation of Realm that authenticates users via the Java Authentication and Authorization Service (JAAS).
      class  JDBCRealm
      Implementation of Realm that works with any JDBC supported database.
      class  JNDIRealm
      Implementation of Realm that works with a directory server accessed via the Java Naming and Directory Interface (JNDI) APIs.
      class  LockOutRealm
      This class extends the CombinedRealm (hence it can wrap other Realms) to provide a user lock out mechanism if there are too many failed authentication attempts in a given period of time.
      class  MemoryRealm
      Simple implementation of Realm that reads an XML file to configure the valid users, passwords, and roles.
      class  NullRealm
      Minimal Realm implementation that always returns null when an attempt is made to validate a user name and password.
      class  RealmBase
      Simple implementation of Realm that reads an XML file to configure the valid users, passwords, and roles.
      class  UserDatabaseRealm
      Implementation of Realm that is based on an implementation of UserDatabase made available through the global JNDI resources configured for this instance of Catalina.
      类型参数类型为Realm的org.apache.catalina.realm中的字段 
      限定符和类型 字段和说明
      protected java.util.List<Realm> CombinedRealm.realms
      The list of Realms contained by this Realm.
      参数类型为Realm的org.apache.catalina.realm中的方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      void CombinedRealm.addRealm(Realm theRealm)
      Add a realm to the list of realms that will be used to authenticate users.

      已过时。 
      protected Realm Embedded.realm
